videoSnippet.title: Invincible! ...Until Proven Otherwise || Carlsen vs MVL || GCT Cote d’Ivoire (2019)
videoSnippet.description:

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Magnus Carlsen vs Maxime Vachier-Lagrave
Grand Chess Tour Cote d棚voire (Blitz) (2019), Abidjan CIV, rd 2, May-11 
Sicilian Defense: Najdorf Variation. English Attack (B90)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. Be3 e5 7. Nf3 Be7 8. Bc4 O-O 9. O-O Be6 10. Bb3 b5 11. Bg5 Nbd7 12. Re1 Rc8 13. a3 h6 14. Bf6 Nf6 15. Nd2 Bg4 16. f3 Qb6 17. Kh1 Be6 18. Nf1 Rc5 19. Ne3 Rfc8 20. Re2 Rc3 21. bc3 Rc3 22. Qe1 Qc6 23. a4 b4 24. Nd1 Bb3 25. Nc3 Bc4 26. Nd1 Be2 27. Qe2 d5 28. ed5 Nd5 29. Qe4 Qe6 30. Ne3 Nc3 31. Qc4 Qg6 32. a5 Kh7 33. Re1 e4 34. fe4 Ne4 35. Nd5 Nf2 36. Kg1 Nh3 37. Kf1 Qf5 38. Ke2 Qe5 39. Ne3 Nf4 40. Kf1 Ne6 41. Qa6 Qh2 42. Qd3 Kg8 43. a6 Bh4 44. Qd2 Nf4

The Côte d’Ivoire Rapid & Blitz is the 1st stage of the 2019 Grand Chess Tour, with World Champion Magnus Carlsen heading a 10-player field that features 7 tour regulars and wild cards Wei Yi, Veselin Topalov and Bassem Amin. The event takes place in the Pullman Abidjan Hotel in Abidjan, Ivory Coast from May 8-12 and has a $150,000 prize fund.

The rapid section is a single round-robin with 3 rounds each day on the first 3 days. The time control is 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second delay from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5 minutes + 3-second delay blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. 

Official website: grandchesstour.org/2019-grand-chess-tour/2019-Cote-dIvoire-Rapid-Blitz
